line.text:
Planned Work
[3] Trains run local in both directions between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Mar 30 - 31

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: Late night service runs express between 148 St and Times Sq-42 St.




Planned Work
[2] Trains run local in both directions between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Mar 30 - 31

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[2] Wakefield-bound trains run express from E 180 St to Gun Hill Rd

Weekend, 7:45 AM Sat to 6 PM Sun, Mar 30 - 31

No Wakefield-bound service at Bronx Park East, Pelham Pkwy, Allerton and Burke Avs.

For service to these stations, take the [2] to Gun Hill Rd and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2].

For service from these stations, take the [2] to E 180 St and transfer to a Wakefield-bound [2].

Alternate travel note:
From these stations, take the Bx39 bus instead.




Planned Work
[1] No trains between 14 St and South Ferry

[2] [3] trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 11:30 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 29 - Apr 1

The South Ferry Station remains closed until further notice.

[1] service operates between 242 St and 14 St.
• Uptown trains skip 18, 23 and 28 Sts.
• Downtown trains skip 28, 23 and 18 Sts, days and evenings.

Travel Alternatives

For 28, 23, 18, Christopher, Houston, Canal, Franklin and Chambers Sts,
take the [2] or [3]* making these stops during this time.

[SB] Shuttle buses make stops between Chambers St and South Ferry.

• Transfer between [1] and [2] [3] trains at Times Sq-42 St (across the platform) or 14 St.
• Transfer between [2] [3] trains and free shuttle buses at Chambers St.

StationShuttle Bus Stop
Chambers St [ad] [2] [3]West Broadway at Chambers St
Fulton St [2] [3] [4] [5] [A] [C]  Broadway at Vesey St (toward South Ferry)
Cortlandt StBroadway at Cortlandt St (toward South Ferry)
Church St at Cortlandt St (toward Chambers St)
Rector StBroadway at Rector St (toward South Ferry)
Trinity Pl at Rector St (toward Chambers St) 
Bowling Green [ad] [4] [5]State St at Battery Pl
South FerryWater St at Whitehall St

Note: At 14 St, [1] trains board at the downtown platform.

*Reminder: Late night [3] service runs express between 148 St and Times Sq-42 St.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[1] Downtown trains skip 28 St, 23 St and 18 St

Weekend, 6 AM to 12 midnight, Sat and Sun, Mar 30 - 31

[2] [3] trains make local stops between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St.

For service to these stations, transfer to the [2] or [3] at Times Sq-42 St.

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [3] instead.

Note: No [1] trains between 14 St and South Ferry during this time.

Planned Work
[6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains run express from Parkchester to 3 Av-138 St

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 29 - Apr 1

Trains stop at Hunts Point Av.

For service to St Lawrence, Morrison, Elder and Whitlock Avs, take the [6] to
Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service to Longwood Av, E 149, E 143 Sts, Cypress and Brook Avs,
take the [6] to 3 Av-138 St and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Hunts Point Av or Parkchester
and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

Note: At Parkchester, Hunts Point Av and 3 Av-138 St all trains board at the
Pelham Bay Park-bound platform.




Planned Work
[6] Pelham Bay Park-bound trains run express from Brooklyn Bridge to 14 St-Union Sq

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 29 - Apr 1

For service to Canal St, take the [J] at Brooklyn Bridge-Chambers St.

For service to Spring, Bleecker Sts and Astor Pl, take the [4] or [6] to 14 St-Union Sq
and transfer to a downtown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to Brooklyn Bridge and transfer to a
Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[5] Bowling Green-bound trains run local from 125 St to Grand Central-42 St
<> Dyre Av-bound trains run local from 14 St-Union Sq to 125 St

Weekend, 6 AM to 11 PM, Saturday, Mar 30

• Please allow additional travel time.

Note: Trains run every 20 minutes during this time.




Planned Work
[4] Utica Av-bound trains run local from 125 St to Grand Central-42 St
<> Woodlawn-bound trains run local from 14 St-Union Sq to 125 St

Weekend, 12:01 AM to 11:59 PM, Saturday, Mar 30

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[C] Euclid Av-bound trains run express from 145 St to Canal St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Mar 30 - 31 • Apr 6 - 7

For 135, 116, 110, 103, 96, 86, 81, 72, 50 and 23 Sts, take the [D] instead,
making these stops during this time. Transfer between trains at 145 St, 125 St,
59 St-Columbus Circle, 42 St-Port Authority or 14 St.

For Spring St, take the [E] instead. Transfer between trains at W 4 St or Canal St.

Alternate travel note:
[E] service is also available at 50 St and 23 St.




Sandy Reroute  Posted: 03/30/2013  8:01PM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22  buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at:  http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[D] Service operates in two sections
Downtown trains run local via the [A] from 145 St to W 4 St

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 29 - Apr 1 • Apr 5 - 8

No Coney Island-bound [D] service at 7 Av, 47-50 Sts, 42 St-Bryant Pk or 34 St-Herald Sq.

Service operates in two sections:
1. Between 205 St and the 2 Av [F] Station, as follows:
Downtown trains are rerouted at 145 St via the [A] local to W 4 St, then via the [F] to 2 Av.
Norwood-bound trains run local from 2 Av to 34 St-Herald Sq and resume regular service.
2. Between W 4 St and Stillwell Av

• Transfer at B'way-Lafayette St (across the platform) to continue your trip.

Travel Alternatives

For service to 7 Av, transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] at 42 St-Port Authority.
Or, take the [D] to the nearby 50 St [A] [C] station instead.

For service from this station, take a World Trade Center-bound [E] to W 4 St and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [D].

For service to 47-50 Sts, 42 St-Bryant Pk and 34 St-Herald Sq, take the [D] to W 4 St and
transfer to an uptown [D] or [F]. Or, use the nearby 50 St, 42 St or 34 St [A] [C] Stations.

For service from these stations, take the [F] to B'way-Lafayette St and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [D].

line.name: JZ
line.text:
Planned Work
[J] No trains between Broadway Junction and Jamaica Center

[E] trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekends, 5:30 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, Mar 30 - 31 • Apr 6 - 7

[J] Service operates between Chambers St and Broadway Junction.
[SB] Shuttle buses make all [J] stops between Broadway Junction and 121 St
and connect with the [E] at Jamaica-Van Wyck.

Travel Alternatives

For service between Broadway Junction and 121 St, take a shuttle bus.
• Transfer between [J] trains and [SB] buses at Broadway Junction.

For Sutphin Blvd/Archer Av and Jamaica Center, take the [E] instead.
• Transfer between [SB] buses and [E] trains at Jamaica-Van Wyck.

StationShuttle Bus Stop

Alabama Avon Jamaica Av at Georgia Av
Van Siclen Avon Jamaica Av at Van Siclen Av
Cleveland Ston Jamaica Av at Elton St
Norwood Avon Jamaica Av at Logan St
Crescent Ston Fulton St at Crescent St
Cypress Hillson Jamaica Av at Hemlock St (toward Jamaica-Van Wyck)
on Crescent St at Jamaica Av (toward Crescent St)
75 St-Elderts Lnon Jamaica Av at 75 St (toward Jamaica-Van Wyck)
on Jamaica Av at Dexter Ct (toward Crescent St)
85 St-Forest Pkwyon Jamaica Av at 85 St (toward Jamaica-Van Wyck)
on Jamaica Av at 86 St (toward Crescent St)
Woodhaven Blvdon Jamaica Av at Woodhaven Blvd
104 Ston Jamaica Av at 104 St
111 Ston Jamaica Av at 111 St
121 Ston Jamaica Av at 121 St
Jamaica-Van Wyck [ad] [E]on Van Wyck Service Rd at 89 Av

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
[R] Forest Hills-bound trains skip 36 St, Steinway St, 46 St, Northern Blvd and 65 St

Weekends, Saturday and Sunday, Mar 30 - 31 • Apr 6 - 7 • Apr 13 - 14

For service to these stations, take the [R] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [R] to Queens Plaza and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].

~ For late night travel at these stations, see [E] advisories.




Planned Work
[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains skip 28 St, 23 St, 8 St and Prince St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Mar 30 - 31

For service to these stations, take the [R] to 14 St-Union Sq or Canal St
and transfer to an Astoria-bound [N] or Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 14 St-Union Sq
or 34 St-Herald Sq and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].




Planned Work
[N] Coney Island-bound trains skip 28 St, 23 St, 8 St and Prince St

Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 29 - Apr 1

For service to these stations, take the [N] to 14 St-Union Sq or Canal St
and transfer to an Astoria-bound [N] or Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 14 St-Union Sq
or 34 St-Herald Sq and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N].

Reminder: [R] service operates in Manhattan days and evenings only.

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2013  9:15PM

B35 & B46 bus service detoured due to NYPD activity on Church Av & Utica Av.

Detour is as follows:

B35 Eastbound: Via Linden Blvd, right on Kings Highway, left on Church Av and regular route.

B35 Westbound: Via Church Av, right on Kings Highway, left on Linden Blvd, left on Albany Av, right on Church Av and regular route.

B46 Northbound: Via Utica Av, left on Tilden St, right on Schnectady Av, right on Linden Blvd, left on Utica Av and regular route.

B46 Southbound: Via Utica Av, right on Linden Blvd, left on Troy Av, right on Utica Av and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2013  8:02PM

B52 bus detoured due to road work.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Gates Av, right on Knickerbocker Av, left on Myrtle Av,left on Harman Av, left on Central Av and regular route. 

Eastbound: Via Gates Av, right on Central Av, left on Palmetto St and regular route. 

Buses will make corresponding bus stops. 

Allow additional travel time. 



Planned Detour
B60 buses detoured due to paving

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured on Wilson Av.

Northbound/Southbound: Buses will make
corresponding stops along the detoured route.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
B35 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Church Av between Flatbush and
Rogers Avs in both directions.

Eastbound: From Church and Flatbush Avs, buses will travel on
Flatbush Av, Linden Blvd and Nostrand Av, then return to its regular
route along Church Av.

Westbound: From Church and New York Avs, buses will travel on
New York Av, Linden Blvd, Caton and Flatbush Avs, then return to its
regular route along Church Av.

New Temporary Eastbound Bus Stops
•Church Av between E 21 St and Flatbush Av
•Linden Blvd between Bedford and Rogers Avs
•Linden Blvd between Rogers and Nostrand Avs
•Nostrand Av between Linden Blvd and Martense St

New Temporary Westbound Bus Stops
•New York Av between Church Av and Linden Blvd
•Linden Blvd between New York and Nostrand Avs
•Caton Av between Bedford and Caton Avs

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
B3 bus route revision

All times

Buses are being rerouted from 86 St at 25 Av.

Westbound: From 86 St, buses will travel along
Stillwell and 25 Avs.

No bus stops will be missed.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Planned Detour
Bx28 and Bx30 buses bypassing stop due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the Gun Hill Rd at Bronxwood Av bus stop.

Eastbound/Westbound: Customers are advised to use the
temporary bus stop on Gun Hill Rd at Colden Av.




Planned Detour
Bx12, Bx12 SBS and Bx22 bus stops are temporarily discontinued due to road construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Fordham Rd between Bronx
River Pkwy and Southern Blvd.

The Bx12 and Bx22 bus stop at Southern Blvd is temporarily
discontinued. Buses will stop at Belmont Av in both directions.

The Bx12 SBS bus stop at Southern Blvd is temporarily
discontinued. Buses will stop at Crotona Av in both directions.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12 and Bx12SBS route changes due to construction

All times

Due to long term construction, bus stops and terminals
have been relocated at Bay Plaza. Buses will operate
as follows:

New Bus Stops
Bx12/SBS Eastbound: On Bay Plz Blvd, far side, Co-op
City Blvd (across from Pier 1/Daffy's).
On Bay Plz Blvd, far side, Co-op City Blvd (across from
Applebee's/Raymour & Flanigan).

Bx12/SBS Westbound:
On Bay Plz Blvd, at Applebee's (First stop).

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx3, Bx11, Bx13, Bx35 and Bx36 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Buses will not make the W 181 St at Amsterdam Av stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to use W 181 St
at Audubon Av for bus service.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2013  8:02PM

M14D and M21 bus detoured due to road work on the intersection of Houston St and Av D.

Detour is as follows: 

M14D Eastbound:  Regular route from Chelsea Piers to Avenue D and 6 St, then left on 6 St, right on FDR Drive service road, regular route from FDR Drive service road and Houston St to Columbia and Delancey Streets.

M14D Westbound:  From terminal at Columbia and Delancey St, continue straight on Delancey St, right on Pitt St, Pitt St becomes Avenue C at Houston St, continue on Avenue C, regular route from Avenue C and 10 St to Chelsea Piers.

M21 Eastbound:  Regular route from Spring St and Washington St to Houston St and Avenue C, then left on Avenue C, right 6 St, right FDR Drive service road, regular route from FDR Drive service road and Houston St to Grand St and FDR Drive.

M21 Westbound:  Regular route from Grand St and FDR Drive to Columbia St and Delancey St, then buses will continue straight on Delancey St, right on Pitt St, left on Houston St, regular route to Spring St and Washington St.

All buses will make all corresponding stops while on detours. 

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to a bus stop closure

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from 7 Av South at West
10 St (Christopher St).

Southbound: Buses will make stops on 7 Av South
at Waverly Pl or Barrow St.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M5 and M20 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops on State St on the far side of Whitehall and Water Sts
and on the near side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers
are advised to board southbound on State St near the South Ferry
Terminal entrance.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from West Broadway at Chambers St.

Southbound: Buses will make stops along West Broadway
between Reade and Duane Sts at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M14D and M21 buses detoured due to road work

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Houston St at Avenue D.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will make corresponding
stops along the detoured route.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M11 buses are running with delays due to construction

All times

Southbound: Buses are running with delays due to construction
on Columbus Av between W 64 and W 63 Sts.

Note: Buses do not operate late nights.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Planned Detour
Q56 buses detoured due to paving

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Jamaica Av between Force
Tube St and Richmond St.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will make corresponding
stops along the detoured route.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q13 and Q16 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured in the area of Fort Totten.

No bus stops will be missed.

Please expect delays in service.

line.name: S40 - S98
line.text:
Planned Detour
S74 buses running with delays due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are running with delays due to construction on
Van Duzer St at Bay St.

No stops missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
S59/S89 bus stop change

Until further notice

To improve efficiency and for customer convenience,
the S59/S89 bus stop will be permanently relocated
from in front of the Eltingville Transit Center to the
existing S79 SBS bus stop.

Northbound: Buses will stop in the S79 SBS bus
stop at the Eltingville Transit Center.

line.name: West Hempstead
line.text:
West Hempstead Branch Customers:


There is no weekend/holiday service on the West Hempstead Branch.  As an alternative, customers are advised to use the Hempstead, Lynbrook, Valley Stream or Merillon Avenue stations (all located in Fare Zone 4).  Please link to http://lirr42.mta.info/ or  or call 511 for train times.
